com.thegongoliers.input.camera

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thegongoliers.input.camera.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows for abstract use of the camera.
    Author:
    Kyle

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Camera.CameraBuilder 
      static class  Camera.LEDColor 
      static class  Camera.Mode 
      static class  Camera.Target 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disableTargetMode()
      This method disables the target mode of the camera to allow it to take normal pictures (exposure auto, brightness was specified in CameraBuilder default=50).
      void display()
      This method displays the current video stream onto the SmartDashboard.
      void enableTargetMode()
      This method enables the target mode of the camera to allow it to see the retroreflection target.
      Camera.Target findTarget(double width, double height)
      This method locates the largest object in the cameras view that is within the custom HSV range.
      org.opencv.core.Mat getImage()
      This method returns the current image from the camera.
      Camera.Mode getMode()
      This method returns the current mode of the camera.
      void setAutoExposure()
      This method returns the cameras exposure level to auto.
      void setBrightness(int brightness)
      This method sets the brightness level of the image.
      void setExposure(int exposure)
      This method sets the exposure level of the camera.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public org.opencv.core.Mat getImage()
        This method returns the current image from the camera.
        Returns:
        The current frame.

      • display

        public void display()
        This method displays the current video stream onto the SmartDashboard.

      • setExposure

        public void setExposure(int exposure)
        This method sets the exposure level of the camera. The parameter exposure is on the scale of 0 to 100.
        Parameters:
        exposure - The exposure of the image.

      • setAutoExposure

        public void setAutoExposure()
        This method returns the cameras exposure level to auto.

      • setBrightness

        public void setBrightness(int brightness)
        This method sets the brightness level of the image. The parameter brightness is on the scale of 0 to 100.
        Parameters:
        brightness - The brightness of the image.

      • enableTargetMode

        public void enableTargetMode()
        This method enables the target mode of the camera to allow it to see the retroreflection target. (exposure and brightness were set in CameraBuilder default=0).

      • disableTargetMode

        public void disableTargetMode()
        This method disables the target mode of the camera to allow it to take normal pictures (exposure auto, brightness was specified in CameraBuilder default=50).

      • getMode

        public Camera.Mode getMode()
        This method returns the current mode of the camera. It returns an enum, Camera.Mode which can either be TARGET or NORMAL.
        Returns:
        The mode of the image.

      • findTarget

        public Camera.Target findTarget(double width,
                                double height)
                         throws TargetNotFoundException
        This method locates the largest object in the cameras view that is within the custom HSV range. This will return a Target object which contains details about the target including its center location, distance, and angle to the camera.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the actual target.
        height - The height of the actual target.
        Returns:
        The target information.
        Throws:
        TargetNotFoundException
